name: Delay No MORE!!
description:
You are already late to work!

However, if you have good enough reasons, your boss may forgive you.      

Here is your checklist!

Let's explore this little world and see how you can create the 'reasons' before you go for your boss!

Controls:       

Left Shift = SPEED UP           

WASD + mouse direction  = movement        

1-6 = select item (if you have)     

E = interact     

Tab = TODO list     

M = Map (can take notes)        

Space = Jump  

Left Click = attack with item (although this should be a game with peace)

      

True to interact with characters/things with different items!    

There are not only one way to solve the tasks    

And there  are total 7 endings (1 Good Ending and 1 Perfect Ending)

Enjoy!

* currently there is no sound
